Class Game

java.lang.Object
Game
public class Game extends Object
Represents the game logic for a pet simulation game. The game includes actions like feeding, playing, walking, taking the pet to the vet, etc., with cooldowns. The pet's stats are managed and updated during gameplay.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(String petType)
      Constructor for the Game class. Initializes the game with a pet type and creates a new pet object.
      Parameters:
      petType - The type of the pet (e.g., "dog", "cat")

  • Method Details

    • gameDecrement

      public void gameDecrement()
      Decrements pet stats over time by calling the pet's increment method. It also checks the pet's state after decrementing the stats.

    • checkState

      public String checkState()
      Checks the pet's state based on its current stats and updates its state. Changes the pet's state to "dead", "sleep", "hungry", or "angry" based on critical conditions.
      Returns:
      The current state of the pet

    • changeState

      public boolean changeState()
      Changes the pet's state back to default if conditions are met. The pet's state is reset based on its hunger, sleep, or anger status.
      Returns:
      true if the state was changed, false otherwise

    • takeToVet

      public boolean takeToVet()
      Takes the pet to the vet to restore health. If the action is on cooldown, it returns false.
      Returns:
      true if the pet was treated successfully, false if on cooldown

    • goToBed

      public boolean goToBed()
      Puts the pet to sleep to restore its sleep stat. If the action is on cooldown, it returns false.
      Returns:
      true if the pet went to sleep successfully, false if on cooldown

    • walk

      public boolean walk()
      Takes the pet for a walk to improve multiple stats (health, happiness). If the action is on cooldown, it returns false.
      Returns:
      true if the pet was walked successfully, false if on cooldown

    • play

      public boolean play()
      Plays with the pet to increase happiness. If the action is on cooldown, it returns false.
      Returns:
      true if the pet was played with successfully, false if on cooldown

    • feed

      public boolean feed(int index)
      Feeds the pet to increase hunger and potentially happiness. If the action is on cooldown, it returns false.
      Returns:
      true if the pet was fed successfully, false if on cooldown

    • giveGift

      public boolean giveGift(int index)
      Gives a gift to the pet to increase happiness. If the action is on cooldown, it returns false.
      Returns:
      true if the gift was given successfully, false if on cooldown

    • restoreFromSave

      public void restoreFromSave(GameSaveData saveData)
      Updates the game state from a saved game. Restores pet, score, inventory, and cooldown timers from the provided save data.
      Parameters:
      saveData - The saved game data to restore from
